com.robopupu.api.util

Class ExceptionToolkit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.util.ExceptionToolkit

  • public class ExceptionToolkit
extends java.lang.Object
    ExceptionToolkit provides a set of convenience methods and utilities for throwing, handling, and using Exceptions.
